channel.title: Rsps help question!

item.title: Rsps help question!
item.dc:creator: @aquatizscape aquatizscape
item.description:
@aquatizscape wrote:

[quote=“ravekitty, post:3, topic:442539”][quote author=aquatizscape link=topic=545226.msg3996441#msg3996441 date=1337341743]
I am getting these errors when i compile. What did i do wrong? Any help strongly appreciated!

[code]if(command.startsWith(“market”)) {
sendQuest("@dre@Economy", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dre@Stocks:", 8145);
sendQuest("@blu@Runes Stock :: + 67%", 8147);
sendQuest("@blu@Food Stock :: + 82%", 8148);
sendQuest("@blu@Range Stock :: + 34%", 8149);
sendQuest("@blu@Slayer Stock :: - 23%", 8151);
sendQuest("@blu@Theiving Stock :: + 46%", 8152);
sendQuest("@blu@Summoning Stock :: -/+ 55%", 8153);
sendQuest("@dre@Stock Market updated every 24 hours!", 8154);
sendQuestSomething(8155);
showInterface(8156);
flushOutStream();
}

if(command.startsWith(“buystock”)) {
String[] cmd = command.split(" ");
if(cmd[1].equalsIgnoreCase(“runes”) && playerHasItem(995, 50000))
deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995),50000);
sendMessage(“You have invested 50,000 coins in the Runes stock!”);

else {

if(cmd[1].equalsIgnoreCase(“food”) && playerHasItem(995, 50000))
deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995),50000);
sendMessage(“You have invested 50,000 coins in the Food stock!”);

else {

if(cmd[1].equalsIgnoreCase(“range”) && playerHasItem(995, 50000))
deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995),50000);
sendMessage(“You have invested 50,000 coins in the Range stock!”);

else {

if(cmd[1].equalsIgnoreCase(“slayer”) && playerHasItem(995, 50000))
deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995),50000);
sendMessage(“You have invested 50,000 coins in the Slayer stock!”);
}[/code]
[/quote]

loling.
Assuming you didn’t think this was the error, Post the error.[/quote]src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:353: error: class, interface, or

item.title: Rsps help question!
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

[quote=“aquatizscape, post:1, topic:442539”]I am getting these errors when i compile. What did i do wrong? Any help strongly appreciated!

[code]if(command.startsWith(“market”)) {
sendQuest("@dre@Economy", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dre@Stocks:", 8145);
sendQuest("@blu@Runes Stock :: + 67%", 8147);
sendQuest("@blu@Food Stock :: + 82%", 8148);
sendQuest("@blu@Range Stock :: + 34%", 8149);
sendQuest("@blu@Slayer Stock :: - 23%", 8151);
sendQuest("@blu@Theiving Stock :: + 46%", 8152);
sendQuest("@blu@Summoning Stock :: -/+ 55%", 8153);
sendQuest("@dre@Stock Market updated every 24 hours!", 8154);
sendQuestSomething(8155);
showInterface(8156);
flushOutStream();
}

if(command.startsWith(“buystock”)) {
String[] cmd = command.split(" ");
if(cmd[1].equalsIgnoreCase(“runes”) && playerHasItem(995, 50000))
deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995),50000);
sendMessage(“You have invested 50,000 coins in the Runes stock!”);

else {

if(cmd[1].equalsIgnoreCase(“food”) && playerHasItem(995, 50000))
deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995),50000);
sendMessage(“You have invested 50,000 coins in the Food stock!”);

else {

if(cmd[1].equalsIgnoreCase(“range”) && playerHasItem(995, 50000))
deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995),50000);
sendMessage(“You have invested 50,000 coins in the Range stock!”);

else {

if(cmd[1].equalsIgnoreCase(“slayer”) && playerHasItem(995, 50000))
deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995),50000);
sendMessage(“You have invested 50,000 coins in the Slayer stock!”);
}[/code][/quote]

loling.
Assuming you didn’t think this was the error, Post the error.

item.description:
@mickie456 wrote:

[quote=“aquatizscape, post:1, topic:442539”]I am getting these errors when i compile. What did i do wrong? Any help strongly appreciated!

[code]if(command.startsWith(“market”)) {
sendQuest("@dre@Economy", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dre@Stocks:", 8145);
sendQuest("@blu@Runes Stock :: + 67%", 8147);
sendQuest("@blu@Food Stock :: + 82%", 8148);
sendQuest("@blu@Range Stock :: + 34%", 8149);
sendQuest("@blu@Slayer Stock :: - 23%", 8151);

String[] cmd = command.split(" ");
if(cmd[1].equalsIgnoreCase(“runes”) && playerHasItem(995, 50000))
deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995),50000);
sendMessage(“You have invested 50,000 coins in the Runes stock!”);

else {

if(cmd[1].equalsIgnoreCase(“food”) && playerHasItem(995, 50000))
deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995),50000);
sendMessage(“You have invested 50,000 coins in the Food stock!”);

these are not errors?

item.description:
@aquatizscape wrote:

I am getting these errors when i compile. What did i do wrong? Any help strongly appreciated!

[code]if(command.startsWith(“market”)) {
sendQuest("@dre@Economy", 8144); //Title

String[] cmd = command.split(" ");
if(cmd[1].equalsIgnoreCase(“runes”) && playerHasItem(995, 50000))
deleteItem(995,getItemSlot(995),50000);
sendMessage(“You have invested 50,000 coins in the Runes stock!”);

else {
